io.github.rahulrvp.android_utils

Class FontUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.rahulrvp.android_utils.FontUtils

  • public abstract class FontUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class to create and set fonts in TextView sub classes.

    Override the getPath() method in derived class to provide path to the font file.

    The default source is /assets folder. to change this you may override the getSource() method and return FILES. This will change the source to files. Make sure that you provide valid path.

    It is recommended to make the derived class to singleton for better performance.

        Applies the loaded font to the given TextView.
        Parameters:
        textView - TextView to set font.
        style - Style of font. Use one among Typeface.BOLD, Typeface.BOLD_ITALIC, Typeface.ITALIC, Typeface.NORMAL
